entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:24 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 6:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets early this evening. Periods of ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to periods of snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
